function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk of job loss in the global travel and tourism sector","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortages of protective equipment, including n95 face masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low numbers of icu beds and ventilators","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on pharmaceutical industry and supply chain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in healthcare access due to overwhelmed healthcare systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide adequate protective equipment for healthcare workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing and monitoring of asymptomatic healthcare workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government financial support may not reach intended recipients due to bureaucratic hurdles or delays","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased economic support may lead to complacency in adhering to public health guidelines, leading to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential increase in fraud due to the large-scale distribution of funds and economic support.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large financial aid packages may encourage increased public spending and economic activity, potentially leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in the community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxed budget policies may lead to a lack of financial resources for long-term public health infrastructure and preparedness, creating vulnerability to future disease outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale financial aid aims to support businesses and affected individuals, but may inadvertently lead to economic disparities, potentially exacerbating social determinants of health and widening health inequities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cancellation and postponement of scientific conferences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on financial markets and global economy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of school closures on families and economic costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on research community","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral outbreak impacting global economy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel restrictions and social distancing impacting availability of inspectors and delivery staff","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on global healthcare systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforced border shutdowns, travel restrictions, and quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global crash in demand for agricultural commodities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on sars-cov-2 prevalence and persistence in wastewater, hindering informed risk management actions for the wastewater sector.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of covid-19, similar to previous outbreaks like sars-cov, necessitating further research and risk management actions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of novel rna viruses presenting a serious threat to global public health and disease control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown variability in sars-cov-2 viral shedding rates between people and within people at different stages of infection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate detection of sars-cov-2 re-emergence or presence/absence through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpublished data on infectious sars-cov-2 in faecal samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wastewater vanalysis' for monitoring covid-19 incidence","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of diseases through air vents and plumbing systems in housing complexes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater, indicating potential presence of the virus.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited sharing of patient data between health authorities and waste services sector","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty around viral shedding from asymptomatic carriers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High contagiousness of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impacts on waste and wastewater industries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor air circulation and constant air movement","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to follow additional protective measures such as wearing masks, gloves, and practicing physical distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended short-range aerosol transmission of the virus in crowded and poorly ventilated enclosures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Debate regarding transmission of small airborne aerosols through ventilation systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-range aerosol transmission due to low ventilation rate","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contamination and spread in indoor dining settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate about the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing the transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent understanding of the role of aerosol airborne transmission in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential negligence in addressing airborne transmission risks due to conflicting expert opinions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation and air filtration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential leakage of exhaust air back into the air supply due to energy recovery ventilation systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited registered products for sanitizing ductwork, especially for fiber glass duct board or fiber glass lined ducts","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of dissemination of infectious aerosols in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
